授業方法: This course will be conducted face to face in classroom from the first class.

第2回:
Part I: History of Postwar Japan: Occupation and Cold War
Week II Prewar Japan and Defeat in the Pacific War

Assigned reading to be completed before joining class.  (approximately 1-hour study).  Understanding of the reading will be checked in class.

Exercise Proposal
Assigned reading to be completed before joining class.  (approximately 1-hour study).  Understanding of the reading will be checked in class.

Assigned reading to be completed before joining class.   (approximately 1-hour study).  Understanding of the reading will be checked in class.
第6回: Week VI    Occupation and Re-Creation in the Cold War (3)
Assigned reading to be completed before joining class.  (approximately 1-hour study).  Understanding of the reading will be checked in class.
第7回:

Week VII Political Schools of Thought in Postwar Japan
Assigned reading to be completed before joining class.  (approximately 1-hour study).  Understanding of the reading will be checked in class.
第8回: Week VIII  Party Politics and Faction Politics in Postwar Japan
Assigned reading to be completed before joining class.   (approximately 1-hour study).  Understanding of the reading will be checked in class.
第9回: Week IX    Political Systems and Party Politics at Present
Assigned reading to be completed before joining class.   (approximately 1-hour study).  Understanding of the reading will be checked in class.

Assigned reading to be completed before joining class.   (approximately 1-hour study).  Understanding of the reading will be checked in class.

Assigned reading to be completed before joining class.  (approximately 1-hour study).  Understanding of the reading will be checked in class.
